generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with visible lane markings and curbs, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area alongside the road, separated by a curb, which is consistent with a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along the street, including one with red brick and white trim on the left and another with a white facade on the right.
- vegetation: Trees and greenery are visible along the street and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- car: Several cars are parked along the street, including a blue van on the left and a dark-colored car on the right.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign is visible on a pole on the left side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with a traffic sign and others supporting streetlights.
